citations.narrative:
There were two recent escapes of both Arctic foxes, "Luna" and "Echo" from their primary enclosure. On 2/23/24, the
foxes escaped through an opening made by an improperly closed service gate. Both animals were successfully captured,
secured in a holding enclosure for observation overnight, and received physical exams by the attending veterinarian. On
3/6/24, Arctic foxes "Luna" and "Echo" escaped their primary enclosure a second time by chewing through the rope-like
netting over the top of the enclosure. Zookeepers recaptured both foxes by netting approximately 45 minutes later.
Allowing animals to escape their primary enclosures places them in danger and provides a severe threat to their health
and well-being. Ensure that all animals, including "Luna and Echo" are securely contained within their primary enclosures
and that the primary enclosures are structurally sound and maintained in good repair.
Correct from 5/15/24 going forward
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There were two recent escapes of both Arctic foxes, "Luna" and "Echo" from their primary enclosure. On 2/23/24, the 
foxes escaped through an opening made by an improperly closed service gate. Both animals were successfully captured, 
secured in a holding enclosure for observation overnight, and received physical exams by the attending veterinarian. On 
3/6/24, Arctic foxes "Luna" and "Echo" escaped their primary enclosure a second time by chewing through the rope-like 
netting over the top of the enclosure. Zookeepers recaptured both foxes by netting approximately 45 minutes later. 
Allowing animals to escape their primary enclosures places them in danger and provides a severe threat to their health 
and well-being. Ensure that all animals, including "Luna and Echo" are securely contained within their primary enclosures 
and that the primary enclosures are structurally sound and maintained in good repair.  
 
Correct from 5/15/24 going forward 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
